extendedInfo.description: "This is so frenzied! My friend and I couldn't stop playing it!." -User Comment"I love QUIZ games, but this makes me really think!" - User Comment.Math Wizard is a FREE and FRENETIC Multiple choice Math game for 1 or 2 players on the same phone! Compete with your friend and decide Who is the Best on Math! Compatible with Tablets (Google Nexus 7!, Samsung Tab, and more) and Smartphones!Help your Wizard to win! With 4 levels of difficulty, many Math operations will appear and you must choose the correct answer.Single Player mode with Highscore list, answer the questions and bet your highscores! The BEST comes with MULTIPLAYER mode:Get your friend! 2 Players, one each side, trying to answer the question in the shortest time, getting points and winning. Frenetic, Frenzied gameplay! Don't miss the chance and try it!Features:* Fully educational game! Think and Practice!* Frenzied gameplay!* 1 Language supported. Spanish coming soon!* 4 Levels of difficulty.* Single and MULTIPLAYER mode!* Operations: Addition, subtraction, multiplication, division, square root, exponential, and more!* Highscore list for Single mode!* Awesome effects and music!------------IMPORTANT--------------This app was made for Display Resolutions over 800x480 (at least). The game will work on lower resolutions, but depending on your device it will have some graphic glitches or lagging. Please, consider this before rating negative.If you have any suggestion, bug or want to contact us, please email us: contact@expstudios.com.ar***********ADVICE:*****************This app uses Google Admob banners and Interstitials. Any IN-APP PURCHASE (coming soon) will disable them.***********About EXP Studios:********************EXP Studios is a one-man army indie studio located in CÃ³rdoba, Argentina.Founded by Exequiel Schvartz, they make games for Android & HTML5. For more information, you can visit our website: http://www.expstudios.com.ar*********DISCLAIMER******************EXP Studios, Math Wizard: Who's the best, Characters and The Wizard are subject to copyright owned by EXP Studios.
